# Lilucat - iPhone Apps

> Lilucat makes simple, useful apps for iPhone. We help users protect their privacy, scan QR codes, clean up storage, and control screen time.

Website: https://lilucat.com
Support: support@lilucat.com

## Apps

### App Lock
- Lock and hide any iPhone app with a password
- Protect privacy by blocking access to social media, photos, and sensitive apps
- 4.8 stars, 4,367 ratings on the App Store
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id6448239603
- Learn more: https://lilucat.com/app-lock/

### QR Code Scanner
- Scan any QR code instantly and create custom codes
- Supports WiFi sharing, contacts, links, and barcodes
- 4.8 stars, 55 ratings on the App Store
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id6745213752
- Learn more: https://lilucat.com/qr/

### QR Code Reader
- Scan QR codes, barcodes, and create your own
- Works with WiFi, contacts, calendar events, and more
- 4.8 stars, 115 ratings on the App Store
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id6469319539
- Learn more: https://lilucat.com/qr-code-reader/

### Security App for iPhone
- Hide private photos and videos behind a password
- Lock apps and protect sensitive content
- 4.8 stars, 70 ratings on the App Store
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id6618155410
- Learn more: https://lilucat.com/photo-vault-x/

### Screen Time Control App
- Block distracting apps on iPhone with one tap
- Schedule app blocking, set daily limits, stop endless scrolling
- 4.8 stars, 872 ratings on the App Store
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id6758152591
- Learn more: https://lilucat.com/screen-time-control/

### Photo Cleaner
- Remove duplicate photos and free up iPhone storage with AI
- Scan camera roll, find duplicates, clean up videos
- 4.9 stars, 645 ratings on the App Store
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id6464665359
- Learn more: https://lilucat.com/photo-cleaner/

### Cleaner: Clean Up iPhone
- Free up iPhone storage and clear app cache instantly
- Delete duplicate photos, clean TikTok and Instagram cache
- 4.8 stars, 518 ratings on the App Store
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id6754160510
- Learn more: https://lilucat.com/cleaner/

## Pricing

All apps are free to download with optional in-app purchases. Lilucat Pro subscription unlocks premium features across App Lock, QR Code Reader, and Security App.
